description: This file contains the GameViewModel class responsible for managing the game state of a Tic Tac Toe game in an Android application. It tracks the game board, current player, game result, and provides methods to play a move and reset the game.

classes.name: GameViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class managing the state of a Tic Tac Toe game, including the board state, current player, and game result.

methods.name: playAt
methods.description: Attempts to place the current player's mark at a specified position on the board; returns true if successful.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game state to its initial conditions.

methods.name: switchPlayer
methods.description: Switches the current player between 'X' and 'O'.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board for a winner and returns 'X', 'O', or null if there is no winner.
